apiClassifier.shortdesc: Contains pregenerated arrays that are used by the HeatMap's internal gradientArray, when setting the theme on the ArcGISHeatMapLayer.

apiClassifierDetail.apiDesc: Contains pregenerated arrays that are used by the HeatMap's internal gradientArray, when setting the theme on the ArcGISHeatMapLayer. The fillCustomPaletteMap method may also be used to populate the "CUSTOM_TYPE" theme using an array of color values.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Fills the custom palette with the colors specified in the array, the colors should be arranged left (cooler) to right (warmer).

apiParam.apiDesc: The array of colors to be used to fill in the heatmap.
The transparency of the custom palette.

apiOperation.shortdesc: Returns the appropriate gradient array based upon the type requested.

apiReturn.apiDesc: The gradient array for the givent heatmap theme.

apiParam.apiDesc: The constant value representing the heatmap theme.

apiOperationDetail.apiDesc: Returns the appropriate gradient array based upon the type requested.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a custom gradient array.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Defines the value of the type property of a custom gradient array.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a rainbow gradient array.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Defines the value of the type property of a rainbow gradient array.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a red white blue gradient array.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Defines the value of the type property of a red white blue gradient array.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a thermal gradient array.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Defines the value of the type property of a thermal gradient array.

apiValue.shortdesc: Defines the value of the type property of a weather radar gradient array.

apiValueDetail.apiDesc: Defines the value of the type property of a weather radar gradient array.
